Posts.Content: Thanks for the information. Is there any pre-emptive action one could take? I had Da Vinci, radical prostectomy 1/22 and the cancer was upgraded to 4+4....the path noted the cancer was stained to the margin. Should I be exploring any proactive measures or wait to watch PSA velocity? Thanks...this is a great forum for us newbies! BDOO
Posts.Title: Factors that determine prognosis for Prostate Cancer
